name: Global X Gold Producers Index ETF
longDescription: GLDX uses the Mirae Asset North American Listed Gold Producers Index as its Underlying Index. The Mirae Asset North American Listed Gold Producers Index includes securities in the gold mining industry. Constituent Issuers must be listed on major US and Canadian Exchanges and meet minimum market capitalization and liquidity screens in order to be eligible for inclusion. In addition, up to a maximum of 20 Constituents will be selected based on market capitalization and weighted according to market capitalization, subject to caps.
fulldescription: GLDX uses the Mirae Asset North American Listed Gold Producers Index as its Underlying Index. The Mirae Asset North American Listed Gold Producers Index includes securities in the gold mining industry. Constituent Issuers must be listed on major US and Canadian Exchanges and meet minimum market capitalization and liquidity screens in order to be eligible for inclusion. In addition, up to a maximum of 20 Constituents will be selected based on market capitalization and weighted according to market capitalization, subject to caps.  GLDX seeks to replicate, to the extent possible and net of expenses, the performance of a capweighted index designed to provide exposure to diversified North American listed gold producers
fullAddress: 9137 East Mineral Circle,Suite 180, Centennial, CO, US
